Author: Brian78
Summary: This Azure PowerShell Workflow Runbook uses a credential to login and looks for all Azure SQL Datawarehouses within a subscription that are not paused.  If it finds any Azure SQL Datawarehouses that are not paused, it pauses them.  It can be scheduled to run at a specific time
Title: Pause All Azure SQL Datawarehouses
UserTags: Azure Automation, Azure SQL Data Warehouse
